titles.title: Streamlining Education Claims Processing Act of 2011

To amend title 38, United States Code, to direct the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to make payments to educational institutions under the Post-9/11 Educational Assistance Program at the end of a quarter, semester, or term, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Hearings Held by the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity Prior to Referral.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity.
Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee (Amended) by Voice Vote .

bill.summary: 6/22/2011--Introduced. Streamlining Education Claims Processing Act of 2011 - Directs certain amounts payable for individuals pursuing approved education under the Department of Veterans Affairs' (VA) post-9/11 educational assistance program to be paid by the VA Secretary within 30 days following receipt of the charges incurred by such individual at the end of the quarter, semester, or term. Sets forth the method for determining the cost per credit hour for established charges payable directly to educational institutions.
